titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 242.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-752, by Mr. Reynolds.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 828.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED VOTE - At the conclusion of debate the Chair put the question on adoption of the resolution and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 195 (Roll no. 506).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/7/2004--Passed House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4520 (American Jobs Creation Act of 2004).
